text:
Steve, with regard to your mission:

> Enable all people to modify the software they use in the course of using it.

How do you weight the two halves? Do you care about people being able to modify their OS? Their programming language? Their firmware? :stuck_out_tongue:

_(Cross-link: <https://futureofcoding.slack.com/archives/C5T9GPWFL/p1545416565019000?thread_ts=1545387390.005400&cid=C5T9GPWFL>)_
